name: Old Fashioned
description: The Old Fashioned is a cocktail made by muddling sugar with bitters, adding whiskey, garnished with a citrus rind.
directions: Place one large ice cube in a low-ball glass.
Add 1/4oz of simple syrup and 4-6 Dashes of bitters of your choice.
Add 2-4oz of whiskey.  For a true-to-history Old Fashioned; use Rye Whiskey. For a less traditional version use Bourbon.
Once all in the glass gently stir until combined.
